about.subtitle: Who We Are
about.title: Our Heritage & Future
about.description: Shoka is a global technology consultancy rooted in the rich history of innovation. We believe that true intelligence comes from understanding where we come from while looking boldly ahead.
about.legacy_p1: Founded in Baghdad with a global vision, Shoka represents the bridge between the cradle of civilization and the digital frontier. Our name reflects our commitment to structure, growth, and resilience.
about.legacy_p2: We don't just write code; we architect systems that stand the test of time. Our team consists of world-class engineers, data scientists, and designers who share a passion for excellence.

values.precision_desc: We measure twice and cut once. Every line of code serves a purpose.
values.standard_desc: International best practices applied to local challenges.
values.partnership_desc: We are not vendors; we are your strategic technology partners.
values.excellence_desc: Mediocrity has no place here. We aim for the exceptional.

contact.subtitle: Get in touch
